function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Underreporting of cases due to lack of access to healthcare services","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of disease burden, delayed response, and increased spread of infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Improving healthcare accessibility, implementing community health monitoring, and promoting reporting incentives","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mobile health applications, and remote monitoring devices","People":"Populations with limited access to healthcare services","Owner":"Government health agencies, NGOs, and community healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Laboratory facilities becoming overwhelmed during epidemics","Impact":"Unreported cases, delayed diagnosis, and rapid spread of infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Investing in laboratory infrastructure, expanding diagnostic capacity, and promoting collaboration between labs","Technologies":"Automated laboratory equipment, rapid diagnostic tests, and decentralized testing facilities","People":"Populations in areas with limited lab access during epidemics","Owner":"Health ministries, research institutions, and international health organizations"},{"Description":"Significant time-lag between data collection and analysis","Impact":"Delayed detection of disease outbreaks, ineffective response, and increased disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implementing real-time surveillance systems, improving data analysis tools, and enhancing information sharing networks","Technologies":"Big data analytics, artificial intelligence, and predictive modeling software","People":"Health surveillance agencies and public health researchers","Owner":"Public health authorities, data analysis firms, and technology companies"}]}
